You know, on a whim I took the latest version of EVPMaker and loaded a mix =
of Stefan's 20% slowed down allophone file and the original 13 tones of Spi=
ricom. I transmitted that raw sound from a modified handheld "walkie talkie=
" and received on a modified "walkie talkie" of the same type and set to th=
e same frequency. I got some interesting results!
=C2=A0
Frank R

aliengirl=
@...> wrote:


From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
Subje=
ct: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP Maker
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, Ap=
ril 8, 2009, 1:27 PM







=C2=A0EVPmaker supplies the raw audio the eniti=
es use to from their voices. Raw audio methods seem to produce clearer, and=
 more consistent messages. The spritis and other entites seem to need bit o=
f human speech and other noise to make their voices. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Frank-S
=


On Wed, Apr 8, 2009 at 9:24 AM, lori bogren <loribogren@hotmail. com> wro=
te:






Jon~
=C2=A0
What is the advantage of EVP Maker over using the bui=
lt in recorder of Windows?
=C2=A0
~Lori



"My life is boring, my fantasies=
 are a theme park." 
--Anne Rice=C2=A0=C2=A0Responding to an interviewer wh=
o just did not get it. 


=C2=A0 




To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
From: jm=
s480@yahoo. com
Date: Wed, 8 Apr 2009 06:49:01 -0700
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC]=
 Some more from last month.
=C2=A0
Hi April,

The lastest version of EVP ma=
ker allows you to capture EVP's directly to your laptop through a microphon=
e attached to the Mic input on your laptop. I got mine from http://www.give=
away oftheday. com.=C2=A0 They give away a different software everyday.=C2=
=A0 They have a section for freeware that you can pickup any time.


Regard=
s,
Jon in Texas
=C2=A0







From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh =
ostresearch. com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Wednesday, April 8, 20=
09 8:35:32 AM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some more from last month.




Wow! Th=
ose are pretty clear! And I have to say that I approve of the color. Purple=
 is my favorite LOL!!!
=C2=A0
You know, I used to have on my computer littl=
e program that I downloaded called "EVP Maker". I wonder if that is the sam=
e EVP maker you mentioned on this site. Unfortunately I lost it when I had =
to reformat my machine, and could not find the link to the original downloa=
d. I believe I found the original link from the "Shadowlands" website, if I=
 remember correctly.
=C2=A0
Besides that, this was YEARS ago, and I really =
did not understand how to use it, or even what it was for.
=C2=A0

iginal Message -----
